sampleArticle.title: How to Build Scalable Applications
sampleArticle.description: A comprehensive guide to building applications that can handle growth
sampleArticle.body:
# Introduction

Building scalable applications is crucial for modern web development. In this article, we'll explore the key principles and patterns that enable applications to grow with user demand.

## Key Principles

1. **Modular Architecture**: Break your application into smaller, manageable pieces
2. **Efficient Data Management**: Use appropriate data structures and caching strategies
3. **Performance Optimization**: Monitor and optimize critical paths

## Conclusion

Scalability should be considered from the beginning of your project.

shortArticle.title: Quick Testing Tips
shortArticle.body:
Testing is essential for maintaining code quality. Here are some quick tips:

- Write tests first (TDD)
- Keep tests simple and focused
- Use descriptive test names
- Test edge cases

Happy testing!

markdownArticle.title: Markdown Guide for Developers
markdownArticle.description: Complete guide to using Markdown effectively
markdownArticle.body:
# Markdown Basics

## Headers
Use `#` for headers of different levels.

## Lists

### Unordered Lists
- Item 1
- Item 2
- Item 3

### Ordered Lists
1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item

## Code

### Inline Code
Use `backticks` for inline code.

### Code Blocks
```javascript
function hello() {
  console.log('Hello, World!');
}
```

## Links and Images

[Link example](https://example.com)

![Image example](https://via.placeholder.com/150)

## Emphasis

*Italic text* and **bold text**

> This is a blockquote

## Tables

| Feature | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| Headers | Use `#` symbols |
| Lists   | Use `-` or numbers |
| Code    | Use backticks |

That's the basics of Markdown!
